text.div:
Tuberculosis (First Line Drugs for Treatment [Combinations]) (RXNORM)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm
    Code Display
    198203 isoniazid 150 MG / Rifampin 300 MG Oral Capsule
    198384 isoniazid 50 MG / Pyrazinamide 300 MG / Rifampin 120 MG Oral Tablet
    199755 isoniazid 100 MG / Rifampin 150 MG Oral Tablet
    199756 isoniazid 150 MG / Rifampin 300 MG Oral Tablet
    206698 isoniazid 50 MG / Pyrazinamide 300 MG / Rifampin 120 MG Oral Tablet [Rifater]
    206702 isoniazid 150 MG / Rifampin 300 MG Oral Capsule [Rifamate]
    631357 isoniazid 150 MG / Rifampin 300 MG Oral Capsule [IsonaRif]
